ygData.subject: RE: Neriak Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: I m on Erollisi.. and actually I get *much* more enjoyment out of the game by actually earning it.  =)  I m just over-curious sometimes I think.  heh Anyways..
ygData.messageBody:
I'm on Erollisi.. and actually I get *much* more enjoyment out of the game by actually earning it. =) I'm just over-curious sometimes I think. heh

Anyways.. I'm only 18... but I can solo the Terrors in that first Terror room near the entrance..

I'll raise my skills up a bit before going any further than that.

Dreven -- Co-seeker of stuph =)

> ----------
> From: Cristie[SMTP:cristie@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 6:06 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Neriak Robes
>
> From: Cristie <cristie@...>
>
> Probably would require a level in the 30s somewhere, although I still think
> you would really need a group to take on the rest of the baddies while you
> whack away at Najena and her co-horts ...there are a lot down there. Have
> you been in Najena much yet Drev? I don't recall if we talked about that
> or not.......
> Most of the folks I see in Najena are in the mid to high twenties.. once in
> a while there will be a group of people who are in the 30s, but I can't
> tell you what they are there for certain but, I'm guessing the Jboots and
> not the robe... and hey, we can all use "gud stuph" no? :) Come over to my
> server and we can share stuph!
>
>
> At 1050 7/20/99 -0700, you wrote:
> >From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> >
> >Nah. No problem. I was wondering what level group could do it, anyway.
> >
> >BUT, I *was* also wondering when you could solo for it... would you
> >have to be 30+ ?
> >
> >Dreven -- seeker of stuph
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: Cristie[SMTP:cristie@...]
> > > Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 5:57 PM
> > > To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > > Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Neriak Robes
> > >
> > > From: Cristie <cristie@...>
> > >
> > > I dun think so... a group in the mid 20s would work from what I
> > > understand...I haven't acquired one yet, but I'm not up there in levels
> > due
> > > to lack of playing time lately.. :) I could be wrong though.. I didn't
> > > mean to imply that one person alone could get this item..but I guess it
> > > kinda looked that way... (you'll have to excuse my quicky reply)... that
> > > would be tough unless the player was way up there
> > >
> > >
> > > At 1025 7/20/99 -0700, you wrote:
> > > >From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> > > >
> > > >To even stand a chance at getting the Flowing Black Robe.. you've got to
> > > >be near lvl 30.. correct?
> > > >
> > > >Dreven
> > > >
> > > > > ----------
> > > > > From: Cristie[SMTP:cristie@...]
> > > > > Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > > > > Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 5:08 PM
> > > > > To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > > > > Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Neriak Robes
> > > > >
> > > > > From: Cristie <cristie@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > Ya know, I agree with um...mstokes I believe (too lazy to scroll back
> > > > > there) and I mentioned this before in my earlier post.. how about
> > buying
> > > > > yourself a goss robe? Its A/C is 8 and isn't a bad robe ... its
> > white and
> > > > > looks good..albeit still a bathrobe look...you should be able to
> > pick one
> > > > > up for some plat or go to befallen and head to third level and
> > acquire one
> > > > > yourself.. :) its much more satisfying to be able to get one
> > > > > yourself...really. OR invis and run through nek forest to lavastorm
> > > > and go
> > > > > into the dungeon Najena and wait with the other throngs to try to get a
> > > > > flowing black robe off Najena. Might be a fun challenge for
> > you...it'll
> > > > > just take some time is all....
> > > > >
